item.aeternam.aeternam_ingot.description: A surprisingly resistant material, yet still very light.
This will be useful in several ways.
item.aeternam.aeternam_speck.description: A glimpse into something far greater. Perhaps you'll need
a way of changing its form to use it properly.
item.aeternam.ancient_nucleus.descriptio: It shifts in your hand. This mysterious construct may be the key
to condensing things into a more robust form.
